oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Mississippi River Scenic Highway
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Transforming the Economy
Infrastructure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This map shows Memphis as the "hub of good highways" for commercial as well as leisure travel. Along with St. Louis, Memphis is shown as an important connection along the Mississippi River Scenic Highway. The map aappeared in the fortieth anniversary edition of the News Scimitar.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain and may be used freely.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
